about:
Hi to my about page! My name is Guilherme Francisco aka [Frozone / Gelado ❄️](https://the-incredibles.fandom.com/wiki/Frozone). I am currently living in Lisbon to study Biomedical Engineering at IST and almost finishing it. I am a curious and open mind as well as a kind person.


 I am passionate about computer science. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. In my university, this passion led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that helped me to do better projects. For example, I taught myself how to use Unity for my thesis

 **Main activities:** 
 🥊 Kick-boxing 
 🦜 Duolingo in japanese 
 👨🏾‍💻 Programming some [random stuff](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cook_fellas) 

 **My personalities:**
 • Enneagram: [3W2 (The enchanter)](https://www.crystalknows.com/enneagram/type-3/wing-2) 
 • 16 personalities: [ENFJ](https://www.16personalities.com/enfj-personality) 

 Values: Dedication, Exploration, Intelligent, Empathy.
